Description: Show Verbose Details in Logging and Display

Notes: Only works against the executing management host, not valide with -m parameter
Not specifying this parameter when no other authentication type is used, will prompt for Administartor user name
Not specifying this parameter when -u or no other authentication type is used, will prompt for Administartor user password

Purpose/Meaning: Set SmartConsole Admin User API Key
Description: Administrative user account user API Key
Notes: Administrator user account must be configured for API Key authentication!

Description: Enables operations for MaaS (Smart-1 Cloud) management
Notes: Added to explicitly set MaaS (Smart-1 Cloud) operations, since that ensures rest of template script can address the changes to operations needed.  Requires CLI parameters for Management Server (-m), Domain (-d), API Context (--context), and API Key (--api-key) or will fail out.
Management API requires either option <web_api> or <{MaaSGUID}/web_api> for Smart-1 Cloud (MaaS)

Description: Gaia / API web ssl port used for API communication
Notes: script will figure this value out when running against the local management host

Description: IP Address (IP v4) of the target management host server
MDSM Domain to operate API activity against
Session file, Fully Qualified File Path, for storage of session details
Notes: This is for retaining information on a session in the event of failure that prevents log-off.  session_file_filepath = fully qualified file path (FQFP) for session file
Default = 600 seconds, allowed range of values 10 - 3600 seconds
Default = 180 seconds, allowed range of values 10 - 3600 seconds [assumed, need to verify, but no documentation!]

Description: Set log file path, Fully Qualified Directory Path
Notes: log_path = fully qualified [directory] folder path (FQDP) for log files

Description: Set output file path, Fully Qualified Directory Path
Notes: output_path = fully qualified [directory] folder path (FQDP) for output files
